item.title: This Theme Readme (github)
item.description: This content is created using: {{< readfile "content/README.md" "true" >}} See more here: This Theme Shortcodes  W3.CSS Basic Theme for Hugo W3.CSS Basic is a website template built with W3.CSS. Inspiration was taken from Universal. It is highly configurable. Change all colors in the blink of an eye, change default settings or disable Frontpage elements. See the exampleSite for a demo. Shortcodes are a means to consolidate templating into small, reusable snippets that you can embed directly inside of your content.
